content:
Changes made:
- There are now less mine spots, especially on smaller maps (from 8 - 20 to 6 - 15% of non void cells)
- Mines now cost 15 flat
- There is now an empty frame at the beginning of each turn, so one can see the game state they received in input

We hope that these changes will make mines a viable option for new players to investigate on without breaking contests AIs.

GL&HF
